mapper.insert: insert into fileInfo values (seq_fileInfo.nextval, #{pathinfo}, #{fname}, sysdate, sysdate, #{etc})
insert into fileInfo values (seq_output.currval, #{pathinfo}, #{fname}, sysdate, sysdate, #{etc})
insert into fileInfo values (seq_project.currval, #{pathinfo}, #{fname}, sysdate, sysdate, #{etc})
mapper.select: select fname from fileInfo where fno = #{fno}
